name: Web based Company Customer Correlation Management System
body:
### Web based Company Customer Correlation Management System

![SanpShot_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30968787/87785071-590ead00-c859-11ea-8479-10299c71d63e.png)
![SnapShot_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30968787/87784923-03d29b80-c859-11ea-9125-a4bedd9712c6.png)

This is a web based system for managaning Company-Consumer Correlation. This system offers a common platform to the consumers, companies and local seller where they can reach each other and acheive their own goals.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
